title: Plan Object Schema
description: A schema for describing the structure of a plan object with nested modules, years, groups, and modules.

title.description: The title of the academic plan.

degreeType.description: The type of degree associated with the plan (e.g., Bachelor, Master).

degree.description: The full name of the degree (e.g., Bachelor of Science with Honours).

year.description: The academic year, represented as a string, e.g. '2024'.

campus.description: The campus where the plan is offered. 'C' for China, 'M' for Malaysia, 'U' for United Kingdom.

academicPlanCode.description: A unique code of variable length representing the academic plan, e.g. U6UFNMTH.

ucasCode.description: The UCAS code for the plan.

school.description: The school or department offering the plan.

planType.description: The type of the plan, e.g., 'Single Subject'.

deliveryMode.description: The mode of delivery, e.g., 'Full-time. In Person'.

duration.description: The duration of the plan (e.g., '3 Years').

planAccreditation.description: Details of any accreditation associated with the plan.

educationalAimsIntro.description: An introduction to the educational aims of the plan (HTML content).

educationalAims.description: The detailed educational aims of the plan (HTML content).

outlineDescription.description: A brief outline description of the plan (HTML content).

distinguishingFeatures.description: Any distinguishing features of the plan (HTML content).

includingSubjects.description: Subjects that are required for the plan.

excludingSubjects.description: Subjects that are excluded from the plan.

otherRequirements.description: Any other requirements needed for the plan.

assessment.description: Information about how the plan will be assessed (HTML content).

progressionInformation.description: Information about progression through the plan (HTML content).

borderlineCriteria.description: Criteria used for borderline cases in assessment (HTML content).

degreeInformation.description: Information about the degree and award regulations (HTML content).

courseWeightings.description: Weighting of different components in the course.

degreeCalculationModel.description: The model used for degree calculation.

otherRegulations.description: Other regulations related to the plan (HTML content).

additionalRegulations.description: Additional regulations related to the plan (HTML content).

learningOutcomes.description: Expected learning outcomes from the plan (HTML content).

modules.description: A list of years, each containing groups and modules.

title.description: The title of the academic year, e.g. 'U6UFNMTH - Part I'.

groups.description: A list of groups in the year.

title.description: The title of the group, e.g. 'U6UFNMTH-PI-Restricted-Group1'.

message.description: A message associated with the group, e.g.'Students must take a minimum of 20 and a maximum of 20 credits from this group.'.

modules.description: A list of modules within the group.

credits.description: The number of credits associated with the module.

taught.description: The semester in which the module is taught.

additionalCourseChoice.description: Any additional course choice information for the year.
